start.question: Rise and shine its your day off from the Krusty Krab. What do you wanna do first?!

answers.a: Go To Patrick's house(...or rock I guess)

1_a.question: Gary cries as you walk out the door. You left him hungry and sad. Patrick emerges from his rock home and greets you. Patrick: `Hey Spongebob wanna go Jellyfishing??`

answers.b: No, I have to go back and feed Gary

1_b.question: You get to Squidward's house and hear very bad clarinet music playing from his window. What do you do?
